message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $18000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be thrilled with your purchase.
I'm really interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand that $18000 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you a deal for $14000. It's a great price for a product of this quality, and I think you'll be happy with the value you're getting. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $14000 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I understand that $11000 is still a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer you a deal for $13000. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great value for the product. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13000 is still a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
